name: Infinite Library
description:
It's free time ! Let's go to the Library !

You are a high school student going to his school's library to infect all the computers inside, but the Library Manager seems to already be prepared for this...

Controls (Default)

Left Click : Interect

Right Click : Use item

Escape Key : (not a) pause menu

WASD/ZQSD : Move

Shift : Run

How to play

The game has a day/night cycle : you will infect the computers only when it's night.

Look around if the Manager is not nearby : she is smart and will not hesitate to angry up if you do anything bad.

Develop strategies : As the Manager is very fastidious, you will need a couple of strategies to put her down.

If she chases you up, don't wait and run : She will take your report book the first time, and damage you after.

The origin of this project

This project was previously left off and discarded, but we have decided to restart the project and give it a fresh new update. Here is how it is looking now.
